trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect in a cone-shaped area along a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Lette objekt som genererer effekten i et kjegleformet område i en angitt retning.

trans-unit.source: SpotLight is a kind of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>, since it has a position, range, and attenuation.
trans-unit.target: SpotLight er en type for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>, fordi den har en posisjon området og demping.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>

trans-unit.source: However, SpotLight also allows you to control the direction, shape, and other properties of the cone of the light's effect.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid kan SpotLight du også kontrollere retningen, formen og andre egenskaper for kjegle den lys effekt.

trans-unit.source: Specify values for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A> (beyond which nothing is illuminated), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> (within which everything is fully illuminated) to change the spotlighting effect.
trans-unit.target: Angi verdier for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>(utover som ingenting lyser), og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A>(i som alt fullstendig lyser) endre spotlighting effekt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lighting between the outside of the inner cone and the outer cone falls off linearly.
trans-unit.target: Lys mellom utsiden av indre kjegle og ytre kjegle faller lineært av.

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram")
trans-unit.target: ![Spotlight diagrammet](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagrammet")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> class using the specified color, position, direction, and cone angles.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte fargen, posisjon, retningen og kjegle vinkler.

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Diffus fargen på den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Position of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen for den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Direction of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retningen på den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Angle that defines a cone outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen som definerer en kjegle utenfor som det ikke lyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: Angle that defines a cone within which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen som definerer en kjegle som lys fullt belyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> projects its light.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> som angir retningen som den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref> genererer lys.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction of the Spotlight's projection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>som angir retningen på den Spotlight-projeksjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0,0,-1`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `0,0,-1`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an angle that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection in which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en vinkel som angir del av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>er kjegleformet projeksjonen som lys fullt belyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: The intensity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s illumination diminishes from full illumination to none in that angle of the light's projection between the InnerConeAngle and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Intensiteten i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s belysningen legge fra fullstendig belysningen til none i den vinkelen på den lys projeksjonen mellom InnerConeAngle og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Spotlight-diagrammet](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight-diagrammet") ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The angle in degrees that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection in which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen i grader som angir del av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>er kjegleformet projeksjonen som lys fullt belyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `180`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `180`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an angle that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en vinkel som angir del av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>er kjegleformet projeksjonen utenfor som det ikke lyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: The intensity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s illumination diminishes from full illumination to none in that angle of the light's projection between the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> and the OuterConeAngle.
trans-unit.target: Intensiteten i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s belysningen legge fra fullstendig belysningen til none i den vinkelen av den lys projeksjonen mellom den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A>og OuterConeAngle.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>

trans-unit.source: The light provides no illumination outside the angle specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: Lys gir ingen belysningen utenfor vinkelen angitt av egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Spotlight-diagrammet](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight-diagrammet") ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The angle in degrees that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: Vinkelen i grader som angir del av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>er kjegleformet projeksjonen utenfor som det ikke lyser objekter i scenen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `90`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `90`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
